creditline: Gift of Gerald Ray Nelson and Joanne Hogan Nelson
description: image of a silhouette of a walking man wearing a tall top hat and trailing neck scarf, with a cane, carrying a goose in a basket; town buildings behind man in middle ground; verso:  shadowy horizontal image (under ink?) of a landscape with trees at left and right
object_name: Printing plate for image of silhouette of walking man with a goose in a basket
provenance: The artist; his stepdaughter, Joanie Nelson, Vancouver, WA
title: Printing plate for image of silhouette of walking man with a goose in a basket
